input_brief: Prepare optimized titles, descriptions, and tags based on refined design briefs and product data; calculate pricing and margins.

listings.title: Esoteric Eye Capitol Dome Conspiracy Tee | All Seeing Eye Illuminati Shirt | Truth Seeker Streetwear | Occult Surveillance Art
listings.description: Bold gold all-seeing eye design hovering above a shadowy capitol dome. For truth seekers, conspiracy culture enthusiasts, and anyone who questions the narrative. Premium soft cotton, available in black, navy, and charcoal. The eye sees what they don't want you to see.

listings.title: All Seeing Eye Capitol Art Print | Esoteric Conspiracy Poster | Dark Academia Wall Art | Occult Home Decor | Illuminati Art
listings.description: Dramatic poster featuring a golden all-seeing eye casting geometric light rays over a shadowed capitol dome silhouette. Museum-quality print on premium matte paper. Statement piece for your office, dorm, or conspiracy corner. Available in 18x24 and 24x36.

listings.title: Esoteric Eye Hoodie | All Seeing Eye Back Print | Conspiracy Streetwear Pullover | Illuminati Occult Hoodie
listings.description: Full back print of the all-seeing eye and capitol dome in gold and dark red on premium heavyweight cotton. Small eye logo on front left chest. The hoodie for those who keep their eyes open. Unisex fit.

listings.title: Cyberpunk Cipher City Tee | Cryptic Skyline Hacker Shirt | Neon Code Streetwear | Matrix City Graphic Tee
listings.description: Dark cyberpunk cityscape with cryptic symbols glowing in neon green across building facades. For hackers, coders, cyberpunk fans, and urban mystery lovers. Decode the city. Premium soft tee in black and dark teal.

listings.title: Cyberpunk City Desk Mat | Cryptic Neon Skyline Gaming Pad | Large Extended Mouse Pad | Hacker Aesthetic Desk Setup
listings.description: 35x15.5 inch extended desk mat featuring a panoramic cyberpunk cityscape with neon green cipher symbols. Premium stitched edges, non-slip rubber base. Level up your desk setup. Perfect for gamers, coders, and cyberpunk enthusiasts.

listings.title: Cyberpunk City Mug | Neon Cipher Skyline Coffee Cup | Hacker Morning Brew | Programmer Gift Mug
listings.description: Wrap-around panoramic cyberpunk cityscape on an 11oz ceramic mug. Neon green cipher symbols glow across the skyline as you sip. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Decode your morning.

listings.title: Redacted Truth Tee | CLASSIFIED Document Shirt | Government Censorship Art | Free Speech Graphic Tee | What Are They Hiding
listings.description: Bold black redaction bars with the message hidden in plain sight: WHAT ARE THEY HIDING. Red CLASSIFIED stamp accent. For anyone who reads between the lines. Premium soft cotton in white, cream, and light gray.

listings.title: CLASSIFIED Stamp Sticker | Redacted Document Vinyl Sticker | Conspiracy Laptop Sticker | Government Censorship Decal
listings.description: Die-cut vinyl CLASSIFIED stamp sticker with distressed texture. Weatherproof, dishwasher safe. Slap it on your laptop, water bottle, or anything they don't want you to label. 3x2 inches.

listings.title: Classified Document Art Print | Redacted Truth Poster | Government Censorship Wall Art | Conspiracy Decor | Declassified Art
listings.description: Photorealistic aged classified document with heavy black redaction bars, coffee stains, and fold marks. Red CLASSIFIED stamp at angle. Looks like it fell off someone's desk at Langley. Premium matte paper.

listings.title: Eyes in the Clouds Canvas Art | Surreal Sky Painting | All Seeing Eye Cloud Art | Surveillance Art Print | Ethereal Wall Decor
listings.description: Surreal twilight clouds with golden eyes subtly hidden within the formations. Beautiful from across the room, unsettling up close. Gallery-wrapped canvas, ready to hang. A conversation piece that watches back. 16x16 inches.

listings.title: Eyes in the Clouds Tee | Surreal Sky Art Shirt | Ethereal Eye Design | Surveillance Art Streetwear
listings.description: Stylized cloud formations with geometric eye symbols in muted blue and cyan. Subtle, artsy, and a little unsettling. For surrealism fans and those who look up. Premium soft tee.

listings.title: Surreal Cloud Eye Tote Bag | Ethereal Art Tote | Artsy Canvas Bag | Unique Market Bag | Surveillance Art
listings.description: Natural cotton tote bag with centered vector cloud-and-eye design in muted blue tones. Artsy, subtle, and functional. Perfect for the gallery, the market, or just carrying your secrets.

listings.title: Sacred Geometry Data Grid Tee | Occult Tech Mandala Shirt | Metatron's Circuit Board | Mystic Technology Streetwear
listings.description: Sacred geometry mandala fused with circuit board patterns and tech symbols. Where ancient mysticism meets modern data. Purple and cyan on black. For the spiritually wired. Premium soft cotton.

listings.title: Sacred Geometry Holographic Sticker | Occult Data Mandala Holo Decal | Mystic Tech Sticker | Laptop Hologram Sticker
listings.description: 3x3 inch die-cut holographic sticker of the occult data grid mandala. Rainbow holographic material shifts colors as you move. Sacred geometry meets iridescent tech. Premium vinyl, weatherproof.

listings.title: Occult Data Grid Tapestry | Sacred Geometry Wall Hanging | Mandala Tapestry | Meditation Room Decor | Mystic Tech Art
listings.description: Large 60x60 inch tapestry featuring an intricate sacred geometry mandala with circuit board trace patterns in purple and cyan on dark background. Perfect for meditation spaces, dorm rooms, or anywhere that needs a portal to the digital mystical. Lightweight polyester.

listings.title: Sacred Geometry Phone Case | Occult Data Mandala Case | Mystic Tech iPhone Samsung Case | Spiritual Art Phone Cover
listings.description: Intricate sacred geometry data grid mandala centered perfectly on your phone. Purple and cyan on dark background. Symmetrical design that looks intentional, not stretched. Available for iPhone and Samsung Galaxy models.

listings.title: The Gaze of Atlas Poster | Cosmic Eye Earth Art Print | All Seeing Eye Space Art | Mythology Wall Art | Epic Sci-Fi Poster
listings.description: A titan-scale cosmic eye gazes down at a glowing Earth from the depths of space. Electric blue light beam connects the watcher to the watched. Epic concept art quality. Statement piece for your wall. Premium matte paper in 18x24 and 24x36.

listings.title: Gaze of Atlas Hoodie | Cosmic Eye Back Print Hoodie | Space Art Streetwear | Epic Mythology Pullover
listings.description: Full back print: a stylized cosmic eye with geometric rays extending down to a wireframe globe. Electric blue on black. Small eye logo on front left chest. For those who see the bigger picture. Heavyweight unisex pullover.

listings.title: Cosmic Eye Canvas Art | Gaze of Atlas Wall Art | Space Mythology Canvas | All Seeing Eye Earth Painting | Sci-Fi Home Decor
listings.description: Gallery-wrapped canvas of the colossal cosmic eye gazing upon Earth from the void. Deep blues and electric blue with warm Earth glow. 20x30 inches, ready to hang. Conversation starter. Gallery-quality.

seo_strategy_notes.title_formula: Primary Keyword + Design Name | Secondary Keywords | Niche/Audience | Gift Angle
seo_strategy_notes.tag_strategy: Front-load highest-volume keywords. Mix broad (graphic tee) with niche (illuminati shirt). 13-15 tags per Etsy listing.
seo_strategy_notes.pricing_strategy: T-shirts $22-25 (competitive entry), Hoodies $49-53 (premium feel), Posters $18-33 (size-dependent), Canvas $54-75 (premium), Stickers $3.99-5.99 (impulse), Desk mats $34.99 (niche premium).
seo_strategy_notes.platform_priority: Etsy first (organic search + niche buyers), Redbubble second (passive/volume), TeePublic third (apparel-focused), Amazon Merch (if approved, scale play).
seo_strategy_notes.seasonal_angles: Halloween boost for T-01/T-03/T-05 (occult/conspiracy). Holiday gifting for all (stocking stuffers = stickers/mugs).
